程序包的使用
org.apache.http.conn.scheme

  • 使用org.apache.http.conn.scheme的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.http.client.fluent
    Simple facade APIs for HttpClient based on the concept of a fluent interface.
    org.apache.http.conn
    Client connection management APIs.
    org.apache.http.conn.scheme
    Deprecated.
    org.apache.http.conn.ssl
    Client TLS/SSL support.
    org.apache.http.impl.conn
    Default implementations of client connection management functions.
    org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm
    Deprecated.
  • org.apache.http.client.fluent使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    Scheme
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use SchemePortResolver for default port resolution and Registry for socket factory lookups.
  • org.apache.http.conn使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    SchemeRegistry
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use Registry
    SocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.1) use SchemeSocketFactory
  • org.apache.http.conn.scheme使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    HostNameResolver
    已过时。 
    (4.1) Do not use
    PlainSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use PlainConnectionSocketFactory
    Scheme
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use SchemePortResolver for default port resolution and Registry for socket factory lookups.
    SchemeSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use ConnectionSocketFactory
    SocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.1) use SchemeSocketFactory
  • org.apache.http.conn.ssl使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    HostNameResolver
    已过时。 
    (4.1) Do not use
    LayeredSchemeSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.2) use SchemeLayeredSocketFactory
    LayeredSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.1) use SchemeSocketFactory
    SchemeLayeredSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use LayeredConnectionSocketFactory
    SchemeSocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use ConnectionSocketFactory
    SocketFactory
    已过时。 
    (4.1) use SchemeSocketFactory
  • org.apache.http.impl.conn使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    SchemeRegistry
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use Registry
  • org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm使用的org.apache.http.conn.scheme中的类 
    类和说明
    SchemeRegistry
    已过时。 
    (4.3) use Registry
